metadata.name: Windy Blue
metadata.description:
That afternoon at the seaside, I felt the sea breeze touching my face. Combined with the falling leaves and the yellow sunlight, I had been relaxed every time I was there to take in the beautiful sceneryâ€¦ with you.
___
Size: 2700x2700px
Duration: 15 seconds
Format: MP4 with audio
